titleStmt.title: A returne from Argier A sermon preached at Minhead in the county of Somerset the 16. of March, 1627. at the re-admission of a relapsed Christian into our Church. By Edward Kellet Doctor of Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Kellett, Edward, 1583-1641.
Byam, Henry, 1580-1669. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] H[arper] for I[ohn] P[arker] and are to be sold by Richard Thrale, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crosse-Keyes,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
"A returne from Argier .. by Henry Byam" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
